items.sentence: Why did you tell Tom that we're just friends?
When was the last time that you ate an apple?
Tom was just thirteen years old at that time.
Tom told everybody he didn't know what to do.
Tom told Mary that he didn't need to do that.
Tom told Mary that he didn't have to do that.
Tom thought that Mary was talking about John.
Tom said he wanted to become a famous singer.
Tom is one of the ugliest people that I know.
Tom is convinced that Mary shouldn't do that.
Tom has given me something that I don't want.
Tom has decided he's not going to work today.
Tom didn't tell anybody he wanted to do that.
Tom didn't know you were planning to do that.
Tom didn't know that Mary had gone to Boston.
Tom didn't know he had to do that by himself.
Tom can play the piano much better than Mary.
Things don't always happen the way we'd like.
Do you enjoy playing cards with your brother?
Would you rather play volleyball or watch it?
